Any text component can include inline modifiers. Inline modifiers come in two flavors: InlineLink and InlineStyle. An InlineLink represents a hyperlink to another webpage and InlineStyle represents a specific style that should be applied to a segment of text (e.g. bold or italic)
This paragraph contains a link a website. Tapping a link navigates the user to the given URL via a webview.
This paragraph contains a few inline styles. Inline styles have support for a variety of effects. Including bold & strong, italicized, small, and strikethrough text.
